JobListing.JobTitle: Engineers with experience in the Gas industry
JobListing.ShortDescription: We are looking to establish relationships with Engineers within the Gas industry for opportunities in 2014
JobListing.JobFullDescription:
Cadden Crowe is a professional search and selection recruitment consultancy that was formed in Sydney in January 1996 and has been built upon the recognition that every client has unique challenges, circumstances and specific needs. Since 1996, Cadden Crowe has grown to have offices in Brisbane, Melbourne and Perth and has established formal alliances in Papua New Guinea, Indonesia and New Caledonia.

Due to market demand we are looking to establish relationships with Engineers within the gas industry. We have a strong portfolio of clients both owner operators and EPCM, who require experienced professionals for their production and projects.

Key professions targeted:

  • Mechanical Engineers
  • E & I Engineers
  • Project Engineer
  • Safety Manager
  • Project Controls Engineer
  • Planning and Scheduling Engineer
  • Environmental Manager
  • Maintenance Manager

For further information please contact Julie Baker on 03 8506 2804 quoting 200018452 or apply online. Resumes must be in Word format

Due to market demand we are looking to establish relationships with Engineers within the gas industry. We have a strong portfolio of clients both owner operators and EPCM, who require experienced professionals for their production and projects.

Key professions targeted:

  • Mechanical Engineers
  • E & I Engineers
  • Project Engineer
  • Safety Manager
  • Project Controls Engineer
  • Planning and Scheduling Engineer
  • Environmental Manager
  • Maintenance Manager

For further information please contact Julie Baker on 03 8506 2804 quoting 200018452 or apply online. Resumes must be in Word format
